languages.text: "Похлебка-то наваристая стала, с мясцом! Вкус все еще скверный, но ем — оторваться не могу".

traits.locale_text: "Похлебка-то наваристая стала, с мясцом! Вкус все еще скверный, но ем — оторваться не могу".

languages.text: "The soup's heartier now, with meat! It still tastes rank, but I can't stop eating it."
languages.original_text: "Похлебка-то наваристая стала, с мясцом! Вкус все еще скверный, но ем — оторваться не могу".

traits.locale_text: "The soup's heartier now, with meat! It still tastes rank, but I can't stop eating it."
"The soup's heartier now, with meat! It still tastes rank, but I can't stop eating it."
"The soup's heartier now, with meat! It still tastes rank, but I can't stop eating it."
"The soup's heartier now, with meat! It still tastes rank, but I can't stop eating it."
"The soup's heartier now, with meat! It still tastes rank, but I can't stop eating it."

languages.text: « La soupe est bien plus copieuse, avec cette viande ! Son goût est toujours aussi répugnant, mais je ne m'en lasse pas. »
languages.original_text: "The soup's heartier now, with meat! It still tastes rank, but I can't stop eating it."

traits.locale_text: « La soupe est bien plus copieuse, avec cette viande ! Son goût est toujours aussi répugnant, mais je ne m'en lasse pas. »

languages.text: «¡Ahora que tiene carne, la sopa tiene más sustancia! Todavía está rancia, pero no puedo parar de comer».
languages.original_text: "The soup's heartier now, with meat! It still tastes rank, but I can't stop eating it."

traits.locale_text: «¡Ahora que tiene carne, la sopa tiene más sustancia! Todavía está rancia, pero no puedo parar de comer».

languages.text: 「スープは肉入りで食べ応えが増えました！まだ味はひどいけど、食べないわけにはいきません」
languages.original_text: "The soup's heartier now, with meat! It still tastes rank, but I can't stop eating it."

traits.locale_text: 「スープは肉入りで食べ応えが増えました！まだ味はひどいけど、食べないわけにはいきません」

languages.text: “现在的汤更好喝了，还有肉呢！虽然味道还是那么冲，但我真是喝得停不下来。”
languages.original_text: "The soup's heartier now, with meat! It still tastes rank, but I can't stop eating it."

traits.locale_text: “现在的汤更好喝了，还有肉呢！虽然味道还是那么冲，但我真是喝得停不下来。”

languages.text: "Mit Fleisch ist die Suppe gleich herzhafter. Sie stinkt zwar immer noch, aber ich kriege nicht genug davon."
languages.original_text: "The soup's heartier now, with meat! It still tastes rank, but I can't stop eating it."

traits.locale_text: "Mit Fleisch ist die Suppe gleich herzhafter. Sie stinkt zwar immer noch, aber ich kriege nicht genug davon."

languages.text: "İşin içine et de girince çorba şimdi daha sağlıklı oldu! Hâlâ ağır koksa da bir türlü doymak bilmiyorum."
languages.original_text: "The soup's heartier now, with meat! It still tastes rank, but I can't stop eating it."
